nodes.text: Brendan Hillin was a employee of Czerka Corporation who worked at the CZ-198 research facility. Hillin stored a tin of warra nut cookies in the employee refrigeration unit, but later found that Doctor Faye had eaten them and left a hologram of him doing so in their place. Furious, Hillin filed a formal complaint calling for Faye's firing to the corporation's Sentient Resources Department.
